item.description:
If you like lobster, the sea, boats, and dining with a great bunch of people you have to come to Abbotts in Noank, CT. on Saturday, Sept. 5, 2009. That weekend will be the last time Abbotts will be serving for the 2009 season. We will be having cocktails (BYOB) and dinner on the open deck by the marina (watch out for sea gulls), enjoying good conversation and a lot of laughs. That's what Have Fun Will Travel is all about. Come celebrate the last weekend of the summer with us..... we will be looking forward to seeing you :)

P.S. The restaurant is actually in Noank which is part of Groton, but the computer would not allow me to plug in NOANK.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a MEETUP SIGN ON THE TABLE.
item.name: ABBOTT'S LOBSTER IN THE ROUGH
